module.name: ContentBlocks
module.description: The content blocks module provides the possibility to re-use content on multiple pages, wherefore the content can be managed in 1 single point, but the changes are immediately visible on all pages it occurs. Content blocks are exceptionally well-suited for recurring content like contact details or call-to-actions.

events.event: Thrown when a content block is created.
Thrown when a content block is changed.
Thrown when a content block is deleted.
